description: The work record entry object shall be a single information object as an object defined in Part 2 and Part 4, and any third-party manufacturing work message profile within a work record .
title: Work record entry
$comment: According to ANSI/ISA-95.00.04-2018 Enterprise-Control System Integration âˆ’ Part 4: Objects and Attributes for - Approved 24 May 2018

links.dtdl:description: This parent work record entry is whole of the child work record entry(s) as the part.
An embedded information object. If data is referenced in this work record entry, the attribute is not used. The format of the information object is specified in the work record specification

The reference to external data (information object) which is stored external to this work record entry. If data is embedded in this work record entry , the attribute is not used. The format of the reference is specified in the work record specification

links.dtdl:name: description
links.dtdl:description: Additional information about the work record entry

informationObject.title: Information object
informationObject.description: An embedded information object. If data is referenced in this work record entry , the attribute is not used. The format of the information object is specified in this work record specification

informationObjectID.title: Information object id
informationObjectID.description: The reference to external data (information object) which is stored external to this work record entry . If data is embedded in this work record entry , the attribute is not used. The format of the reference is specified in this work record specification

informationObjectType.title: Information object type
informationObjectType.description: Identifies the type of information object type that a work record entry is based upon. The allowed information object types are defined in the work record specification

effectiveTimestamp.title: Effective timestamp
effectiveTimestamp.description: The date and time that the work record entry was/is effective. If no effective timestamp is provided with work record entry , the effective timestamp is represented by the effective timestamp attribute in the work record

recordTimestamp.title: Record timestamp
recordTimestamp.description: The date and time the publisher recorded / transacted the action. If no entry is provided, the record timestamp is the record timestamp attribute in the work record
